import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPenToSquare } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons' import { faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export const Todo = ({task, line, toggleComplete, editTodo, deleteTodo}) => { return (

toggleComplete(task.id)}>{task.task}

{line}

editTodo(task.id)} /> deleteTodo(task.id)} />
) }
